posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

11/28/22 - 12/4/22
Issue - V128
Current Release: 1.15.1

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps
  • = components

Updates

  • Check out Streamlit-Authenticator—a custom component by @mkhorasani to help with apps that require user authentication and privileges.
  • Learn from @robertritz how to build an app to generate Spotify playlists for top songs from selected years.

Featured Content

  • Streamlit components hub @jrieke
  • Generate Tweets @kinosal
  • Molecular icons generator

Tutorials/Introduction

  • How to build a protein structure prediction app in Python using ESMFold and Streamlit @dataprofessor
  • 10 extra Streamlit widgets you didn’t know existed @andfanilo
  • Tutorial Python | Membuat Aplikasi Prediksi Penyakit Jantung Menggunakan Streamlit
  • Tutorial Python | deployment aplikasi Prediksi Penyakit Jantung Menggunakan Streamlit Share
  • Streamlit: Criando aplicações web | Live de Python #227
  • Grade Prediction Application implementation, through Decision Tree Algorithm and Streamlit
  • Easily create a Python dashboard web application using Streamlit
  • Membuat Aplikasi Analisis Sentimen Twitter Menggunakan Streamlit
  • Wild animal image classifier
  • Full Stack Application Development using Snowflake’s Native Application Framework
  • State management in Streamlit
  • I Used ChatGPT to Create an Entire AI Application on AWS
  • Unlocking the Power of Streamlit: A Comprehensive Guide to Deploying Python Web Apps to the Cloud
  • Build a Real-Time Inventory Management System in 6 Hours Using Streamlit and YOLOv5
  • How to deploy/publish Streamlit apps to Heroku
  • Temp Converter: Upgrade to Streamlit
  • Streamlit Image App Overview
  • Erstellen eines Streamlit Accounts
  • Streamlit Apps mit stlite sharing
  • Build a Media Analysis Dashboard with Python & Cloudinary
  • Connecter une application Streamlit à une base de données
  • Introducción a la gestión de la operación del modelo de aprendizaje automático (MLOps) con Streamlit
  • Pixar Characters streamlit App
  • OpenAI’s ChatGPT Streamlit Series Part 3: Building auto reponse generator any customer review
  • Make Money Online using Python + Streamlit | Build a Sales Page to sell Digital Products
  • Invoice Annotation with Sparrow/Python
  • Streamlit - Lit Protocol Extension UPDATED
  • Streamlit AG-Grid の横幅max値について
  • How to Create an ML Visualization and Monitoring App With Streamlit on Snowflake
  • streamlit を使って WOL を投げるWebアプリを作ってみる
  • Building a Full-Text Search Engine for fastai YouTube channel

Science and Tech

  • stmol poster @napoles3d
  • Stroke Prediction Using Random Forest Classifier
  • Statistics for Data Science
  • DNA Nucleotide Count
  • DizEase
  • EPANET Viewer using EPyT and streamlit.io

NLP and Language

  • Generate Abstracts From Titles of cs.CL Arxiv Papers @raj26000
  • Welcome to ScholarWeb
  • Convert Whatsapp .txt export into .csv

Data Visualization

  • PyDepGraph @shangfr
  • Monitor Rosa - dados mensais (câncer de mama)
  • Les cinémas de France
  • IGD
  • Egypt High School Data Analysis 2022
  • Automóviles eléctricos

CV and Images

  • OCR Comparator
  • A Flower Image Recognition App
  • Zero Shot Captcha Solver
  • Snowpark Python: Image Recognition in Snowflake

Sports

  • Web App FutPythonTraderPunter voltado às Apostas Esportivas utilizando o Streamlit

Finance and Business

  • Laptop Price Predictor
  • Stock Prediction App
  • House price Prediction App This app predicts the House Prices
  • Análise do Mercado Financeiro
  • Application de détection de fraude de carte de crédit
  • Blockchain Transaction and Ledger Record powered by Streamlit
  • streamlit · Streamlit — Mozilla Firefox 2022 11 20 07 18 50
  • streamlit · Streamlit — Mozilla Firefox 2022 11 20 07 09 29 Trim

Geography and Society

  • Site Suitability for Canadian Vineyards
  • Identifying Commercial Centers
  • Gesopatial Applications for Dynamically Viewing Earth!
  • In The Sky Scanner
  • Santa’s test flight
  • Establecimientos productivos en el AMBA
  • ClimateNow Videos and Podcasts Q&A Engine

General

  • Web FTP Client Based on Streamlit and Ftplib @BeyondMyself
  • LinkedIn User Prediction App
  • REVOIC Flatfile Merge and Analysis Tool

Model building and training

  • Train your own machine learning model
  • Streamlit App for Clustering Models

Cool happenings and other things

  • Streamlit labeling component

Follow us

  • Twitter
